Title: Coded
Plot: Allison's daughter Ariel dreams that she is a young girl named Sarah being held captive by an ogre in a castle. While Joe agonizes over the possibility that both of his daughters have inherited their mother's psychic abilities, Allison tries to help Ariel and interpret the dream. However, Allison's advice provokes Ariel to run away from a field trip in order to follow up a clue.
GuestStars: Jennette McCurdy, Don Harvey, Joe Chrest, Maura Soden, Jake Dinwiddie, Nelson Mashita
